original_text:
“Sing, O barren one, who did not bear;
    break forth into singing and cry aloud,
    you who have not been in labor!
For the children of the desolate one will be more
    than the children of her who is married,” says the Lord.
korean_text: 잉태하지 못하며 출산하지 못한 너는 노래할지어다 산고를 겪지 못한 너는 외쳐 노래할지어다 이는 홀로 된 여인의 자식이 남편 있는 자의 자식보다 많음이라 여호와께서 말씀하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: you who have not been in labor
For the children of the desolate one will be more
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 황무한 자의 자녀가 더 많을 것임이라

sentences.original_text: than the children of her who is married
